text: Asatke sat theke prthaka na kara paryanta tomara ye abasthaya rayecha allaha muminaganake se abasthaya chere dite parena na. Anurupabhabe gayeba samparke tomaderake abahita kara allahâ€Œra niyama naya; tabe allaha tamra rasulaganela madhye yake iccha manonita karena [1]. Kaje'i tomara allaha o tamra rasulaganera upara imana ana. Tomara imana anale o takâ€Œoya abalambana kare calale tomadera jan'ya mahapuraskara rayeche
